overview.html:
• Explore default configurations.

    • Identify if systems are using default passwords or users
  • Use hardening guides & common min-configurations to identify weak/vulnerable configurations.

summary.html: Examine configuration files for vulnerabilities using "hardening", or "common mistake" guides found online.

walk_through.html: This will depend on the particular software or system you are examining. Use online guides and product documentation to check the security status of exiting configurations.
